name: Unfair Siege
description:
ALSO RATE THE GAME ON NEWGROUNDS: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/814335

The objective is simple: Survive a wave of endless swarm of tanks.

Try to kill as many as possible.

--------------CONTROLS-----------------------

W,A,S,D - Movement

LMB - Shoot

P - pause

--------------CREDITS---------------------------

Everything - Me
